title: Loading into LOL Games
body: I don't know how to fix this, but every time I try to load into a league game, there seems to be a problem. It puts me into the game loading screen, everyone will be at zero for at least 2 minutes, and then everyone will go up at the same percentage, or it will usually say "failed to connect, please try again". I never really had this problem, My internet seems to be find, and I have nowhere else to turn.

replies.body: Your network might be hitting some weird hangup when it's trying to load into the actual game. You do need to make a new connection to the game servers, so let's double check those network settings just as a first step. Adjust your port forwarding and DNS settings following those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but definitely, let me know if that doesn't seem to help.

I have almost the excact same problem,

-I load in a game and it stays at 0% for     everyone for a solid 5 minutes.
-Everyone's percenrage starts climbing in sync and never geos higher hen 48%

What I have figured out is that from the moment the percentage starts climbing, the game starts. *WHILE THE GAME THINKS I AM LOADED IN*. So a lot of the times when I join into a game I immediatly get kicked for being inactive. So I retry and basicly restart the cycle.

So okay now i am mad,
I just tried to play a single game, tried to reconnect 5-6 times but failed, and now I got the 20 min low-priority que.
